title: Event hall charges and other related fees up by 40%
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The All Ceylon Banquet Hall and Catering Association says it has decided to increase event hall and other related fees by 40%.
Its Chairman, Athula Kaluarachchi stated that the decision was taken owing to the price hikes of essential goods.
However, he stated that only 40% increment applies to the orders and reservations which were already received previously.
